CodeEditorModel.Text:
'************************************************************************************* '* Events management '* Autor: Pierre Clot '* Date: 19.09.2023 '* Version: S02V01 '* '* Description : '* Management of events that are raised globally '* '* S02V01: '* - Add buzzzer order '* '*************************************************************************************
''' <summary> ''' Call when an input is done ''' </summary> Public Event OnInput
Public Sub NewInput RaiseEvent OnInput End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Called each day ''' </summary> Public Event OnDayChange
Public Sub NewDay RaiseEvent OnDayChange End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Start buzzer sound ''' </summary> Public Sub Buzzer_On BuzzerOn(_eHMI_BUZZER_TYPE.ContinuousBuzzer) End Sub
''' <summary> ''' Stop buzzer sound ''' </summary> Public Sub Buzzer_Off BuzzerOff() End Sub
